subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|蒞任|蒞官|蒞止|蒞盟|蒞祚|蒞臨|蒞蒞|高軒蒞止}}

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In mainland China, <big>蒞</big> and {{l|zh|涖}} are considered as {{w|Variant Chinese characters|variant forms}} of {{l|zh|莅}} which is used as a simplified character.
* In Taiwan, <big>蒞</big> is considered as the orthodox form while {{l|zh|涖}} and {{l|zh|莅}} are variant forms of <big>蒞</big>.
* In the historical {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}, the entry for <big>蒞</big> refers to {{l|zh|莅}} instead.
